availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Eddyville, Kentucky, manufacturer. North Carolina native. Married to M. K. Paine. Father of Eudora Paine, J. E. Paines, Laura Paine, B. P. Paine, and Mary Paine. Manufacturer in Eddyville in 1865.

ab.bibl: Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 9; Ancestry.com. U.S. IRS Tax Assessment Lists, 1862-1918 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations Inc, 2008., Lyon County, Kentucky, November 1865.
